text: Lisa Klein (born 15 July 1996) is a German professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's WorldTeam . ==Career results== ;2013 : National Junior Road Championships ::2nd Road race ::3rd Time trial ;2014 : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 5th Road race, UCI Junior Road World Championships ;2015 : 2nd 15px Team pursuit, UEC European Under-23 Track Championships (with Anna Knauer, Mieke Kroeger and Gudrun Stock) : 4th Crescent Vargarda TTT : 9th Road race, National Road Championships ;2016 : 2nd Crescent Vargarda TTT : 3rd Team time trial, UCI Road World Championships : UEC European Under-23 Road Championships ::3rd Time trial ::10th Road race : National Road Championships ::6th Time trial ::8th Road race : 8th Overall Tour de Feminin-O cenu Českého Švýcarska ;2017 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::4th Time Trial : 1st Prologue Giro della Toscana Int. Femminile – Memorial Michela Fanini : 2nd Crescent Vargarda TTT : 2nd Scratch Race, Six Days of Bremen : UEC European Under-23 Road Championships ::3rd Time trial ::5th Road race : 4th Overall Healthy Ageing Tour ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 4th Overall Festival Elsy Jacobs ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 5th Overall Ladies Tour of Norway ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2018 : 1st 15px Team time trial, UCI Road World Championships : 1st 20px Omnium, National Track Championships : 2nd Overall BeNe Ladies Tour ::1st 20px Young rider classification : UEC European Under–23 Road Championships ::2nd Time trial ::9th Road race : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships : 3rd Gent–Wevelgem : 4th Ladies Tour of Norway TTT : 4th Crescent Vårgårda TTT : 5th Overall Festival Elsy Jacobs ::1st Prologue : 6th Overall Healthy Ageing Tour ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2019 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st 20px Overall BeNe Ladies Tour ::1st Prologue & Stage 2b : UEC European Road Championships ::2nd 15px Mixed team relay ::2nd 15px Time trial : 2nd 15px Mixed team relay, UCI Road World Championships : 2nd Nokere Koerse ;2020 : 1st 20px Mixed team relay, UEC European Road Championships ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:German female cyclists Category:German track cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Saarbrücken
title: Lisa Klein (cyclist)
